lead_paragraph: Relegation-haunted Newcastle United will be without injured defenders Fabricio Coloccini and Chancel Mbemba against Bournemouth on Saturday and have a fitness doubt over Andros Townsend, said manager Steve McClaren.
snippet: Relegation-haunted Newcastle United will be without injured defenders Fabricio Coloccini and Chancel Mbemba against Bournemouth on Saturday and have a fitness doubt over Andros Townsend, said manager Steve McClaren....
